body:
I've always wondered what the actual date Ingi (Ingigo, who I know irl) showed me MCzone... I've always considered myself a veteran.. But how much?
today I found the answer.. And it wasn't one of them web archives I'd already checked them... The answer was on my iPad all along! I looked through all the photos on it and found two screenies of Ingi and I's profiles!
here's what I found :D 
as you can see I was a little more hooked than Ingi at first, but he joined a lot earlier before showing me! The nostalgia is real guys! The days!
